Title: Ninjas Are Awesome - For & Against

Claim: Ninjas Are Awesome - For & Against
For: Yep for sure
For: Pretty much. In fact it's hard to think of anybody (at least where boys and men are concerned) who wouldn't think having ninja skills would be very cool, and probably many women would go for it too.
Against: Chinese kungfu should be more Awesome,lol~~~

Pretty much. In fact it's hard to think of anybody (at least where boys and men are concerned) who wouldn't think having ninja skills would be very cool, and probably many women would go for it too.
